page.title: 11FARMING
page.content: {There}are all sorts of farms nowadays but most farm land.The most farm knowledge that I have is of a farm in Poltimore. They farm animals but they used to farm land as well but they used to get the ear but nothing was in it. So they decided to stop and grow grass for the animals to eat.Some farmers can grow cereals. There are 12 farms in {BROADCLYST AND POLITOMORE { INTERVIEW WITH A FARMER The first thing I do in the morning is milk the cows ,it is the last thing too.The machinery I own is 3 Massy tractors and other machinery. I own 10 acres and 4 people work for me. I farm animals and I work from 6.30am to 9.00pm.I would not swop for another job because I live here. {BY SIMON ELKINS {****************{
